document_data.name: Mina Neyman
document_data.mainbody: '''Mina Neyman''' was an acolyte of [[Kelemvor]] who lived in [[Neverwinter]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The priest had blond hair and a scar on the right side of her face.
document_data.Relationships: She served in a contingent under [[Volahk]] with the mission of clearing the [[Neverdeath Graveyard]] of [[undead]].
document_data.History:
As of the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Acolyte Neyman was stationed at [[Doomguide's Watch]] in Neverdeath. After a contingent of [[doomguide]]s went missing in [[the Rift]], Neyman and Volahk worked with an adventurer to uncover their whereabouts.

Some time later she accompanied that adventurer on a mission to cleanse the graveyard surrounding the [[Lynching Tree|Tree of Souls]], an area that had been corrupted by [[Thay]]an [[Red Wizards]].
